Text:
Great ! You're back
Thanks for all your uploads
hey welcome picalou. kastleba, it's good to see you're still around. cheers mate.

Ah nice surprise. I was starting to miss 80s new wave and go onto 80s funk !!

Thanks for the reality check. But now you couldn't do something about this fat slob-cum-muscular-slob that keeps popping up on the side of my screen to put me off sex and eating, could you.

Glad you're back.

Anyways, thanks a ton for all these uploads.

I spent a few days downloading all of them, about 389 torrents and 65GB.

Thanks again and I'll seed them as long as I can.

Yo D-Money when you gonna post some rap instead of this New Wave crap? Peace out!


P.S. I'm glad you're back.
Glad to see you're back! I was getting a little worried...lol. Thank You!

I am very glad that you are still here 80zforever.  I have been checking your blog at regular intervals for the last five months.  I am sure many people appreciate you who haven't posted here!  If you are ever in either the Atlanta or San Francisco Bay Area, drinks/refreshments on me =)
Hi again 80zforever. The Rodway is really a stellar album. Also, the song Video Freak on Pop Moderne has been in heavy rotation here lately !! Thanks.
SO glad to see you back! I'm all over this, thanks again for taking the time out to share your amazing collection.
